TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(object sender, AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs -> unit

span.span: The object that raised the event.

summary.span: 表示一个方法，该方法由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序实现以处理焦点更改时由 UI 自动化提供程序引发的事件。

span.span: Represents the method implemented by the UI Automation client application to handle the event raised by a UI Automation provider when the focus has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用来定义客户端来处理调用的方法的委托[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]焦点更改事件。Use an delegate to define the method that is called by a client to handle [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] focus-changed events. 由此`sender`可能不具有任何缓存的属性或模式，具体取决于应用程序时此事件的订阅是否处于活动状态。The represented by `sender` might not have any cached properties or patterns, depending on whether the application subscribed to this event while a was active. ## Examples 下面的示例实现一个委托来处理焦点更改事件。The following example implements a delegate to handle focus-changed events. [!code-csharp[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/CSharp/FocusTracker.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAFocusTracker_snip/VisualBasic/FocusTracker.vb#106)]

related.span: 订阅 UI 自动化事件
